channel.title: Need custom PDF generation? I offer it
channel.description:
Hi people,
If you need custom PDF output generated via programming, take a look at my PDF creation toolkit, xtopdf:
http://slid.es/vasudevram/xtopdf
I offer consulting related to programmatic PDF generation / creation using xtopdf and similar tools.
Contact me at vasudevram@gmail.com
Cheers.
